name: 戴楠青
objective: This interdisciplinary workshop involves students from fields of Communication Engineering and Interaction Design. The workshop introduces technologies of robotic control kits of turtlebot, and digital fabrication techniques for rapid prototyping for design proposal. Through collaboration, students are expected to develop a working prototype that is designed to resolve problems identified in today’s social behavioral patterns.
